David Gakuru (amụrụ n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Rwandan na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge.
N'afọ 2017, o sonyere na asọmupi ụmụ nwoke ndị okenye na 2017 IAAF World Cross Country Championships nke emere na Kampala, Uganda. Ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke iri isii na abụọ.
N'afọ 2018, o sonyere na ọkara marathon ụmụ nwoke na 2018 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships nke emere na Valencia, Spain. Ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke 109th.
